channel.title: ajax on Brian Lachniet
channel.description: Recent content in ajax on Brian Lachniet

item.title: Partial Views with Unobtrusive AJAX
item.description: In my recent exploration of web development in ASP.NET, I found what I assume to be a fairly common need to have part of a view/page update without the entire page updating. In my particular case, I wanted to have a page that listed items but also provided a form that allowed you to add an item. When an item was added, the list of items would be updated without having to regenerate the entire page.
